name: I Won't Slay Dragons for You
name_original: I Won't Slay Dragons for You
description:
Luke and you have been thrown into a world of fear, a maze of his own mind. Help him traverse his inner world.

He can do this.

Controls

Interact with the world by "bumping" into the different items/characters.

  • Desktop: Use the arrow or WASD keys.
  • Mobile: Swipe in the direction you want to move to.
